alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued September 02 at 9:24PM MST until September 02 at 10:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... West central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Eastern Imperial County in southeastern California... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 1030 PM MST/1030 PM PDT/. * At 924 PM MST/924 PM PDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Midland to near Palo Verde to near Yuma Proving Ground, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 101 and 144. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 38 and 57. CA Route 78 between mile markers 37 and 80. Locations impacted include... Martinez Lake, Desert Center, Blythe, Nicholls Warm Springs, Cibola, Palo Verde, Kinter, Yuma Proving Ground and Glamis. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
